welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rockwood, where small-town charm meets breathtaking natural beauty. Get ready to discover our quaint shops, delicious local cuisine, and stunning outdoor scenery. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Rockwood has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richmond International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Richmond International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Richmond International Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dinwiddie County Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dinwiddie County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
